channel.title: Multi hits and setitem
channel.description:
if you keep clicking on npc/players it keep hitting loads anyone know how to stop it?
--------------------------------------------- also :P does anyone know how to disable setitem its anoying :P loads of ppl use it on my server

item.title: Multi hits and setitem
item.dc:creator: @The_Mentor The Mentor
item.description:
@The_Mentor wrote:

else if(command.startsWith("setitem")) { if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME")) { sendMessage("Ok YOUR NAME, feel free to setitem"); } else { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to setitem and has been raped!"); disconnected = true; } Use this then, it just disconnects them when they do it.

Read full topic

item.title: Multi hits and setitem
item.dc:creator: @Screwy Screwy
item.description:
@Screwy wrote:

Don’t know, but you can make it kick instead lol. For the kick problem look for a tut on stopping mass clickers. Or increase the weapon delay of the weapon(s).

Read full topic

item.title: Multi hits and setitem
item.dc:creator: @The_Mentor The Mentor
item.description:
@The_Mentor wrote:

else if(command.startsWith("setitem")) { if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME")) { sendMessage("Ok YOUR NAME, feel free to setitem"); } else { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to setitem and has been auto banned!"); appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; }Add that command, put your name to the spots where’s your name. When someone setitems they get banned.

Read full topic
